properties.description: Our focus is for families and young adults but ALL are welcome. We run a community cafe on Tuesday and Thursdays 10-2 for cheap meals or if cannot afford it we will privde soup and sandwich for free and a warm space please ask at reception. Church services are on Sunday 10.30-12 with hot drinks after.
properties.title: Fullarton ConneXions

properties.address: Main Street, West Kilbride, North Ayrshire KA23 9AW
properties.description: Free Wi-Fi, refreshments available, newspapers, board games and toys for toddlers. Church is also open on a Tuesday morning from 10am for our Rendezvous Coffee morning - all welcome. Sunday Service is at 10.30am with hot drinks afterwards.
